edu.cnm.deepdive.diceware.view

Interface PassphraseAdapter.OnContextListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainActivity
    Enclosing class:
    PassphraseAdapter
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public static interface PassphraseAdapter.OnContextListener
    Listener for PassphraseAdapter context (long) presses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLongPress(Menu menu, int position, Passphrase passphrase)
      Handles a long press on a specified position in the PassphraseAdapter.

    • Method Detail

      • onLongPress

        void onLongPress(Menu menu,
                 int position,
                 Passphrase passphrase)
        Handles a long press on a specified position in the PassphraseAdapter.
        Parameters:
        menu - Menu instance to which context items may be attached.
        position - index of pressed item in PassphraseAdapter.
        passphrase - pressed instance of Passphrase.
